name: ribbed wonder easy hat
sizes_available: adult with instructions for resizing included
notes:
meet the ribbed wonder, a fun and quick crochet project!

includes instructions for an easy crochet hat pattern. 

> please note that this pattern is
> available for free on my blog
> [here][1]. the benefit of purchasing
> this pdf is an easy to read,
> printable, and ad-free version of the
> pattern.

materials needed:
- chunky weight yarn (exact brand and color provided)
- crochet hook size l/11 8mm
- tapestry needle for weaving in ends.

sized for an adult but easy to adjust to other sizes (guidelines given).

pattern is written in english, using standard american terms 

level: beginner.
